description.value: When firing any kind of Las Weapon on Semi or Full Auto, the character gains one additional Degree of Success on any successful test if they did not take a Move Action on their turn.

system.benefit: When firing any kind of Las Weapon on Semi or Full Auto, the character gains one additional Degree of Success on any successful test if they did not take a Move Action on their turn.

specialAbilities.name: Sustained Fire
specialAbilities.description: When firing Las Weapons on Semi or Full Auto without moving, gain +1 Degree of Success on successful attacks.
